name: Bank Norwegian Visa
rewards: 0.5% on all purchases, 1% on foreign currency, 3–5% on Norwegian flights
description: A versatile no‑fee card with flexible reward options, including cashback or CashPoints. Travel and grocery insurance included.

name: Morrow Bank Mastercard
rewards: Simple reward points system with extra points on online purchases
description: Great everyday card offering points on all purchases and a low effective interest rate.

name: TF Bank Mastercard
rewards: Monthly discount program and hundreds of retailer discounts
description: Awarded best no‑fee card in 2025 with broad discounts and complimentary insurances.

name: InstaPay Mastercard
rewards: Ultra‑low interest rate and generous credit limit
description: Ideal for those who may carry a balance, with a competitive interest rate and up to 100k NOK credit limit.

name: Local Bank Student Visa
rewards: 0.5% cashback on groceries and 0.2% on other purchases
description: Designed for students with low fees and modest credit limits.

name: Another Bank Student Mastercard
rewards: Points redeemable for cinema tickets and transport discounts
description: Perfect for students who want entertainment perks and no foreign transaction fee up to a threshold.

name: Prepaid Student Card
rewards: No rewards (prepaid)
description: A reloadable prepaid card for budgeting and secure online purchases.

name: Premium Travel Card
rewards: 2% cashback on travel, access to airport lounges, concierge service
description: For frequent travellers seeking premium benefits like lounge access and comprehensive insurance.

name: Eco Green Card
rewards: Extra points for public transport and electric car charging
description: Encourages sustainable spending habits with bonuses on eco‑friendly purchases.

name: Business Flex Card
rewards: 1% cashback on all business expenses and accounting software integration
description: Ideal for small business owners seeking easy expense tracking and travel benefits.

name: Travel Student Card
rewards: Points on public transport and discounted youth travel insurance
description: Designed for students who travel frequently within Scandinavia.

name: Cashback Pro Card
rewards: 3% cashback on groceries, 2% on fuel and 1% on all other purchases
description: High cashback rates for heavy spenders, offset by a modest annual fee.

name: Minimalist Card
rewards: No rewards
description: Bare‑bones card for those who want a fallback payment method with no frills.

name: Family Rewards Card
rewards: Shared rewards account for households, bonus points on children’s items
description: Accumulate points as a family and redeem them for travel or shopping vouchers.

name: Smart Saver Card
rewards: Round‑up savings feature that invests spare change in a savings account
description: Automatically rounds up each purchase and saves the difference for you.

name: Airline Points Card
rewards: Earn miles with every purchase and enjoy free checked bags
description: Ideal for frequent flyers looking to accumulate airline miles and travel perks.

name: Balance Transfer Card
rewards: 0% introductory rate on balance transfers for 12 months
description: Helps you consolidate existing credit card debt and pay it off interest‑free during the introductory period.

name: Crypto Rewards Card
rewards: Earn 1.5% back in Bitcoin on every purchase
description: For tech‑savvy users who want to accumulate cryptocurrency instead of traditional points.

name: Luxury Card
rewards: Concierge service, airport lounge access, 5% cashback on luxury retailers
description: Premium card for high spenders seeking exclusive experiences and top‑tier benefits.

name: Charity Card
rewards: Donate 0.5% of your spending to a charity of your choice
description: Support a good cause with every purchase without paying an annual fee.

name: Pet Lover Card
rewards: 2% cashback on pet supplies and vet bills
description: Geared towards pet owners with perks such as discounted pet insurance and donations to animal shelters.

name: Sports Fan Card
rewards: Points redeemable for tickets and merchandise of your favourite teams
description: Earn points for every purchase and redeem them for sports memorabilia or match tickets.

name: Home Decor Card
rewards: 8% cashback on furniture and home decor purchases
description: Perfect for homeowners or renters looking to furnish their space while earning significant cashback.

name: Online Shopper Card
rewards: 2% cashback on all online purchases and extended warranty on electronics
description: Tailored for avid online shoppers who value cashback and extended warranties on electronics.

name: LGBTQ+ Pride Card
rewards: Donate 1% of purchases to LGBTQ+ organisations and earn points for pride‑themed merchandise
description: Support LGBTQ+ causes and enjoy themed rewards and merchandise.

name: Health & Wellness Card
rewards: 5% cashback on gym memberships, yoga classes and health foods
description: Encourages a healthy lifestyle with generous cashback on wellness products and services.

name: Educators Card
rewards: 1.5% cashback on books and educational supplies
description: A special card for teachers and students working in education with extra benefits on learning resources.

name: Family Travel Card
rewards: 4% cashback on family travel bookings and children fly free deals
description: Catered to families who travel together, offering high cashback and deals for children.

name: Public Transport Card
rewards: Earn 3% back on public transport fares and monthly passes
description: Ideal for commuters using buses, trams and trains within Norway.

name: Home Improvement Card
rewards: 6% cashback at hardware stores and DIY shops
description: Earn significant cashback on renovations and DIY purchases while enjoying purchase protection.
